org.zaproxy.zap
Class ZapGetMethod

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase
      org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.GetMethod
          org.zaproxy.zap.ZapGetMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod
public class ZapGetMethod
extends org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.GetMethod

Do not ignore HTTP status code of 101 and keep Socket & InputStream open, as 101 states a protocol switch. Is essential for the WebSockets extension.

Allow response code 101, that is Switching Protocols.

getUpgradedConnection

public java.net.Socket getUpgradedConnection()
If this response included the header Connection: Upgrade, then this method provides the corresponding connection.

Returns:
Upgraded Socket or null

getUpgradedInputStream

public java.io.InputStream getUpgradedInputStream()
If this response included the header Connection: Upgrade, then this method provides the corresponding input stream. It might happen, that WebSocket frames are sent directly after the WebSocket handshake response. In this case the frames are buffered in that stream.

Returns:
Input stream from response or null
